allow: Bash("/c/Program Files/R/R-4.4.1/bin/Rscript" -e "tryCatch\({ source\(''app.R'', local=TRUE\); cat\(''Syntax OK\\n''\) }, error = function\(e\) cat\(''Error:'', conditionMessage\(e\), ''\\n''\)\)")

Bash("/c/Program Files/R/R-4.4.1/bin/Rscript" -e "
tryCatch\({
  # Suppress startup messages
  suppressPackageStartupMessages\({
    source\(''R/generate_placeholder_data.R''\)
    source\(''R/utils_data.R''\)
    source\(''R/utils_plots.R''\)
    source\(''R/mod_scatter_plot.R''\)
    source\(''R/mod_word_details.R''\)
    source\(''R/mod_context_viewer.R''\)
  }\)
  
  # Test data generation
  cat\(''Testing placeholder data generation...\\n''\)
  data <- generate_all_placeholder_data\(\)
  cat\(''  Word associations:'', nrow\(data$word_associations\), ''rows\\n''\)
  cat\(''  Position distributions:'', nrow\(data$position_distributions\), ''rows\\n''\)
  cat\(''  Party usage:'', nrow\(data$party_usage\), ''rows\\n''\)
  cat\(''  Context database:'', nrow\(data$context_database\), ''rows\\n''\)
  
  cat\(''\\nAll modules loaded successfully!\\n''\)
}, error = function\(e\) {
  cat\(''ERROR:'', conditionMessage\(e\), ''\\n''\)
}\)
")
